description: Installation of six 3G antennas (three Telefonica and three Vodafone antenna) mounted onto three pole mounts and one radio equipment cabinet together with ancillary equipment on the roof of China Inland Mission.
decision_conditions: REASON: The proposed 6 antennas and 1 radio equipment cabinet by reason of their inappropriate design scale, height, bulk and siting in a prominent location would form a dominant and visually harmful development. The proposed development is therefore considered to have an adverse impact on the character and appearance of the host building and the Newington Green Conservation Area. The development is contrary to policy 9 of Islingtonâ€™s Core Strategy 2011, policies C17 (Telecommunications Equipment), D3 (Site Planning), D4 (Designing in Context) and D11 (Extensions and Alterations) of the Islington Unitary Development Plan (2002), Conservation Area Guidance note, section 2.6.3 of the Islington Urban Design Guidelines (2006) and PPS 5.
